sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: Always and in everything let there be reverence;

sense.def: don't you> Don't!

tls:text.tls:line: Always and in everything let there be reverence;

sense.def: show respectful diligence in action

tls:text.tls:line: and with speech composed and definite.

sense.def: text; formulation, statement; sentence; rhetoric CHECK EXAMPLES

tls:text.tls:line: This will make the people tranquil.

sense.def: marker of the imperative modality.

tls:text.tls:line: the desires should not be indulged;

sense.def: desires; preferences; impulse

tls:text.tls:line: the will should not be gratified to the full;

sense.def: one's high intent; one's aspirations; one's moral aspiration, one's highest ambition; one's main tendencyBUDDH: religious aspirations

tls:text.tls:line: pleasure should not be carried to excess.

sense.def: joyful satisfaction; state of delight or happiness; joyfulness; joy, delight; happiness;

tls:text.tls:line: can stand in awe of others and yet love them.

sense.def: [cognate with wēi 威 "authority" fear and revere; stand in awe of 畏天之威

tls:text.tls:line: can stand in awe of others and yet love them.

sense.def: take good care of; 好好照顧

tls:text.tls:line: can stand in awe of others and yet love them.

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:text.tls:line: 3. 4. When you find wealth within your reach, do not (try to) get it by improper means;

sense.def: obtain the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: When you meet with calamity, do not (try to) escape from it by improper means.

sense.def: na4n: difficult point, difficulty; what is difficult; difficult task; difficulties ahead

sense.def: don't you> Don't!

sense.def: dubious; doubtful

be possessive about (see 居)

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 6. If a man be sitting, let him do so as a personator of the deceased;

sense.def: 若夫Ｘ: as far as X is concerned

sense.def: kneeling

tls:text.tls:line: if he be standing, let him do so (reverently), as in sacrificing.

sense.def: to fast

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 7. In (observing) the rules of propriety, what is right (for the time and the circumstances) should be followed.

sense.def: decide to follow (advice or suggestions); follow intentions; obey (laws etc); act in accordance with (a tradition etc); LY: follow (a dynasty) and take one's values from; follow (a path[which is not an ordinary act of following behind])

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 7. In (observing) the rules of propriety, what is right (for the time and the circumstances) should be followed.

sense.def: what is appropriate and helpful

tls:text.tls:line: 4. 7. In (observing) the rules of propriety, what is right (for the time and the circumstances) should be followed.

sense.def: descriptive: ritual practices, rituals; ritual; the ceremonies

tls:text.tls:line: In discharging a mission (to another state), its customs are to be observed.

sense.def: decide to follow (advice or suggestions); follow intentions; obey (laws etc); act in accordance with (a tradition etc); LY: follow (a dynasty) and take one's values from; follow (a path[which is not an ordinary act of following behind])

sense.def: current local custom; temporary habit

tls:text.tls:line: that furnish the means of determining (the observances towards) relatives, as near and remote;

sense.def: "Now,", "In fact," introducing new subject for the discourse, and introducing non-narrative theoretical discourse.

sense.def: arbitrarily, wildly; without authorisation

sense.def: infringe on others

sense.def: devote oneself to study; be devoted to study; engage in intellectual work; work to improve oneself morally/intellectually

sense.def: to come in order to V; come so as to V; come for the purpose of Ving

tls:text.tls:line: I have not heard of (the master) going to teach.

sense.def: be engaged in teaching, give instructions

tls:text.tls:line: that is the essence of ritual propriety.

sense.def: essence DC: 性質；本質。《論語·衛靈公》："君子義以為質，禮以行之。"《史記·樂書》："中正無邪，禮之質也；莊敬恭順，禮之制也。" 張守節 正義："質，本也。" 王西彥 《古屋》第五部二："要緊的不是名詞，而是實質。"

tls:text.tls:line: cannot be fully carried out without the rules of propriety;

sense.def: without

tls:text.tls:line: and cause them, by their possession of them,

sense.def: cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]
